checkAxis

configure

  • configure(parent: any, property: string, __namedParameters?: { max?: number; min?: number; n?: number; reverse?: boolean }): boolean

  • Configure the axis as a member variable given by its name (property)

    example

    configure(sampler, 'cohesion', {n:10, min:0, max:1, reverse:false})

    Parameters

    • parent: any

      The object supporting the property (e.g., object['pressure'], where object is the parent and pressure is the property)

    • property: string

      The property name of this derived class

    • __namedParameters: { max?: number; min?: number; n?: number; reverse?: boolean } = ...
      • Optional max?: number
      • Optional min?: number
      • Optional n?: number
      • Optional reverse?: boolean

    Returns boolean

forEach

  • forEach(cb: Function): void
  • example

    this.forEach( (_: any) => { const value = this.compute() })

    Parameters

    • cb: Function

      a function callback

    Returns void
